Docs.summary: Represents a statement that consists of a single expression.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement> contains a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> object, and it can be added to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> object, allowing some expressions to stand alone. For example, a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression> contained by a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement> can represent a method call without a return value.
